languages.text: Burning damage taken by enemies immobilized or slowed by webbers is increased by 35% as long as the effect persists

traits.locale_text: Burning damage taken by enemies immobilized or slowed by webbers is increased by 35% as long as the effect persists

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies currently {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} by this character's webber is increased by +35%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies, currently {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} by this character's webber, is increased by +35%.

{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies currently {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} by this character's webber is increased by +35%.

{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies currently {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} by this character's webber is increased by +35%.

languages.text: このキャラクターのウェバーで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}あるいは{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}された敵、受ける{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を+35%増加する。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies, currently {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} by this character's webber, is increased by +35%.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターのウェバーで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}あるいは{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}された敵、受ける{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を+35%増加する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Обездвиженные{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедленные{/g} сетеметом персонажа враги получают на 35% больше {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies, currently {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} by this character's webber, is increased by +35%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Обездвиженные{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедленные{/g} сетеметом персонажа враги получают на 35% больше {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Обездвиженные{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедленные{/g} сетеметом персонажа враги получают на 35% больше {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} von Gegnern, die vom Netzwerfer dieses Charakters {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g} wurden, erhöht sich um +35 %.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies currently {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} by this character's webber is increased by +35%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} von Gegnern, die vom Netzwerfer dieses Charakters {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g} wurden, erhöht sich um +35 %.

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} que sufren los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizados{/g} por el lanzarredes de este personaje aumenta un +35 %.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies currently {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} by this character's webber is increased by +35%.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} que sufren los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizados{/g} por el lanzarredes de este personaje aumenta un +35 %.

languages.text: 此角色使用捕网枪将敌人{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}期间，受影响的敌人承受的{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}提高35%。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies currently {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} by this character's webber is increased by +35%.

traits.locale_text: 此角色使用捕网枪将敌人{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}期间，受影响的敌人承受的{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}提高35%。

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} infligés aux ennemis actuellement {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisés{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentis{/g} par le lance-toile du personnage augmentent de +35 %.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies currently {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} by this character's webber is increased by +35%.

traits.locale_text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} infligés aux ennemis actuellement {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisés{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentis{/g} par le lance-toile du personnage augmentent de +35 %.

languages.text: Bu karakterin ağdolayanı yüzünden {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlama{/g} etkisi altında olan düşmanlar, +%35 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarına{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies currently {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} by this character's webber is increased by +35%.

traits.locale_text: Bu karakterin ağdolayanı yüzünden {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlama{/g} etkisi altında olan düşmanlar, +%35 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarına{/g} maruz kalır.
